snippet.title: ANIMAL 2 | How Far Will He Go to Save His Son? | Full Movie
snippet.description:
A man serving a life sentence learns his son is in serious trouble.
Protecting his family means facing the life he tried to leave behind.

James “Animal” Allen is serving a life sentence when events inside the prison system force him into a new facility and back toward a past he hoped was over. When he discovers his son has been falsely accused of a serious crime, Animal is pressured to use the skills that once defined him in order to help from the inside. Outside the walls, his other son works with a lawyer to uncover the truth, setting both paths on a collision course toward justice.

Director: Ryan Combs
Cast: Ving Rhames, Vicellous Shannon.
© Published under license.
#Animal2 #FullMovie #CrimeThriller #Action #Drama
